May 18, 1963 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
Recollections of Verdi
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest - 1st Slaithwaite 85, 2nd Linthwaite 84, 3rd Hepwoth 83. Hymn tune contest - 1st Slaithwaite 47, 2nd Linthwaite 45. Best instrumentalist - Harold Hill (trombone) Hepworth. 37th annual contest
April 4, 2012, 8:51 p.m. Sept. 26, 2016, 5:51 p.m.
1 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) A. H. Beardsell
2 Slaithwaite Band Roy Newsome
3 Linthwaite Silver Band Willie Kaye
4 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Sydney Fripp
